about_the_game:
Last souls is a 2D side-scrolling Metroidvania soulslike game.
The player controls a mysterious caped character and explores a labyrinthine, dark and cold world.



The world of Last souls is divided into 7 regions.

  • cave
  • poisonous forest
  • abandoned mine
  • burning cavern
  • bottomless pit
  • misty lake
  • frozen city
  • peak of the gods

Each region has a boss who give an ability.



More than 30 weapons divided into 5 classes.
Many different spells and "talisements" that influence the gameplay.
Various skills and a crafting system of consumables.

I present you my first game "Last Souls", student in computer science, I decided to start creating video games.
The game is not finished yet, but I'm working on it 100%.
I hope you will like it :]
